questions: Simulator replication of aircraft and surrounding environment

In your own words, describe how well the performance of the GBTS in this mission allows for the transfer of skills to the T-7A (and other) aircraft. (Consider the simulation fidelity and realism, sequence of steps required to complete trainingobjectives, "sim-isms", and simulated aircraft, weapon, and sensor performance):

The system helps me achieve my goals
I understand the limitations of the system
I understand the capabilities of the system
The system performs the way it should
I feel comfortable relying on the information provided by the system
I understand how the system executes tasks
I am rarely surprised by how the system responds
